channel.title: McDougal Littell Math Answers
channel.description:
"Oops" I have a teachers account.. :)
These are the 2004 and 2007 editions of Algebra 1, Geometry, and Algebra 2. If you need one of the other books on [url=http://www.classzone.com/cz/find_book.htm?tmpState=IL&disciplineSchool=ma_hs&state=IL&x=11&y=41]here[/url] then just post and I'll see what I can do ;) Edit: Doesn't look like the site'll let me get 2007 series answers :(
Note: I generated these automatically from a pattern so there might be links to chapters that don't exist.
Answers with work shown a bit farther down this page.
[img]http://www.classzone.com/cz/books/shared/images/books/selection/cvr_algebra_1.gif[/img] [URL=http://olp.classzone.com/materials/2612952/M1H01AAD.PDF?ticket=6911450668599676580435211604]Chapter 1 item.description:
@ChaosSliver wrote:

“Oops” I have a teachers account…

These are the 2004 and 2007 editions of Algebra 1, Geometry, and Algebra 2. If you need one of the other books on here then just post and I’ll see what I can do
Edit: Doesn’t look like the site’ll let me get 2007 series answers

Note: I generated these automatically from a pattern so there might be links to chapters that don’t exist.
